text: Donald James Nicholls, Baron Nicholls of Birkenhead, PC (born 25 January 1933), is a British lawyer. He was a Law Lord (Lord of Appeal in Ordinary). From 1998 to 2004, he was a Non-Permanent Judge of the Hong Kong Court of Final Appeal.'Hong Kong Court of Final Appeal - Former Judges - The Right Honourable The Lord NICHOLLS of Birkenhead' accessed 3 June 2016 He retired from the membership of the House of Lords on 3 April 2017. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Law lords Category:People from Birkenhead
title: Donald Nicholls, Baron Nicholls of Birkenhead
